sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO INSR4100 (DPOB_CD, SYSTEMKEY, EMYMT_SEIL_NUM) SELECT AA.DPOB_CD, AA.SYSTEMKEY, AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM FROM PSNL0110 AA WHERE AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM = (SELECT MAX (BB.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM) FROM PSNL0110 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND EMYMT_TYP_CD = 'A0420010') AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM INSR4100 NN WHERE NN.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND NN.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND NN.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM = AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM)

INSERT INTO INSR4100 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , NAT_PENN_AQTN_DT , NAT_PENN_LSS_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , #emymtSeilNum# , #natPennAqtnDt# , #natPennLssDt# , #kybdr# ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE INSR4100 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum# , NAT_PENN_AQTN_DT=#natPennAqtnDt# , NAT_PENN_LSS_DT=#natPennLssDt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#

UPDATE INSR4100 AA SET AA.NAT_PENN_AQTN_DT=#natPennAqtnDt# , AA.ISMT=#ismt# , AA.REVN_DT= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , AA.REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND AA.SYSTEMKEY= (SELECT SYSTEMKEY FROM PSNL0100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND RESN_REGN_NUM = Replace(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') ) AND AA.EMYMT_SEIL_NUM = (SELECT MAX(EMYMT_SEIL_NUM) FROM PSNL0110 TP01, PSNL0100 TP02 WHERE TP01.DPOB_CD = TP02.DPOB_CD AND TP01.SYSTEMKEY = TP02.SYSTEMKEY AND TP02.RESN_REGN_NUM = Replace(#resnRegnNum#,'-','') AND TP01.DPOB_CD = AA.DPOB_CD AND TP01.SYSTEMKEY = AA.SYSTEMKEY AND TP01.EMYMT_TYP_CD = 'A0420010')
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM INSR4100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , NAT_PENN_AQTN_DT , NAT_PENN_LSS_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR4100 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND EMYMT_SEIL_NUM=#emymtSeilNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM , NAT_PENN_AQTN_DT , NAT_PENN_LSS_DT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM INSR4100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , EMYMT_SEIL_NUM DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM INSR4100 WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
SYSTEMKEY LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
